June 18, 1983 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A) 500 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-a
None
Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wright]
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK 'The Ninth of January (Sym No 11)' - Shostakovich arr. D. Stephens: 1 St Dennis, 82 2 Redruth, 79 3 Kernow, 78 4 Bodmin, 77
Best player: Philip Hawke, Baritone, Redruth
Special Awards Best Soprano: Neil Brodie, Bodmin Best Solo Cornet: Norman Johns, Redruth Best Euphonium: John Hitchens, Redruth Best Solo Horn: Peter Strongman, Kernow Brass Best Basses: St. Dennis Youth
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: No Nominations
Deportment (judge WO Roberts): 1 Torrington (Class C) 2 Bideford (Class B)
July 18, 2010, 9:56 a.m. Aug. 6, 2013, 10:10 a.m.
1 Redruth Town Leonard Adams
2 Bodmin Town Band Alan Jenkin
3 St. Austell Kernow Alan Slaughter
